about_the_game:
A unique fusion of farming and slapstick combat, Harvest Havoc is a chaotic online PvP party game for 2-6 players. Grow, harvest, (steal) and sell your crops to win! Fight with your fists or grow some weapons to mess with your friends and aid your crop-stealing mischief. Gather your friends, bring out your inner gremlin and compete to become the ultimate farmer-warrior!

Multiplayer for 6

Best played with friends, family or co-workers, play with up to 5 other farmer-warriors in online multiplayer

Grow, Harvest, Sell!

Find the seed packets scattered around the map and plant it to start your farming spree. Be the one to earn the most money. But watch out: farmers might have their eyes on your precious crops.

Steal & Sabotage!

Wanna mess around with your friends? Use your fists or grow some weapons to smack them around and steal their crops for yourself!

Teams VS Free-for-all

Want to work together? Or is it every farmer for themselves? Choose how you want to play.

Character Selection

Choose your wacky character from a selection of 5 animal costumes and 8 colours.

5 Thematic Maps & 3 Game Modes

Play in a variety of "farms" with different ways to play and navigate each map. If it feels too slow for you or you want more bare-knuckle brawling, try out the different game modes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent (2 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection recommended, however game can be played over local area network (LAN) connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent (3 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
